title: Voodoo Amumu skin
body:
I thought that Voodoo Amumu would be a great concept;
Consider these aspects of why a Voodoo Amumu skin would be a great addition to Amumu's skin set:
- Goes with Amumu's standard sad and dull theme.
- Amumu's character's size and shape of both art and in-game sprite fit perfectly with the build of a voodoo doll (cannot provide images due to copyright reasons.)
- In-game aspects (abilities, dances, voicing etc.) could easily be reworked (if necessary) to fit the voodoo theme.
- Lastly... it rhymes! :)

replies.body:
Yeah but like Voodoo is the Cult that created Zombification so it's a bit of an evil theme considering the reality of what it represents.

Maybe like a Gothic Amumu since that's a dark theme that has re-presented itself in modern times and could be basically the same without the dark magic aspect tied to it.
